pages.text:
To get started making jam, you will need the following equipment and ingredients:
$(li) A bucket of water
$(li) A piece of sugar
$(li) A jam pot
$(li) An empty jam jar
The crafting recipes for the jam jar and pot can be seen on the following pages.

The jam pot is your main tool within the jam making world.
It is used to mix your jam to create all manor of flavours and...atrocities if you wish.
It's the first port of call for any new jam maker.

The jam jar is a reusable container from which to eat to your heart's content.
It is used to store and eat your jam.
